author: Aruna Viswanatha
title: Senior FBI Official Expresses Concern About Lack of Public Trust
text:
A senior FBI official weighed in Thursday on recent criticism of the bureau, declining to respond directly to attacks from President Donald Trump and others but saying he is concerned about a loss of trust in the FBI.
“When I look through the prism of risk for our organization, I find the No. 1 risk for our organization is losing the faith and confidence of the American people,” said David Bowdich, the Federal Bureau of Investigation’s acting deputy director. Mr. Bowdich said he didn’t “want to get into the politics of anything...
